main.name: Ankit Varshney
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hello! I’m Ankit Varshney, a passionate Frontend Developer with over two years of experience. I've had the privilege of working with both startups and established companies to create intuitive and responsive web applications. Throughout my journey, I discovered my enthusiasm for empowering aspiring developers to unlock their potential. I take pride in mentoring others and sharing my knowledge through engaging tutorials and projects. My portfolio showcases a range of innovative builds that reflect real-world challenges in web development. Join me as we explore the exciting world of technology together, gaining hands-on experience and essential skills that will pave the way for your success in the industry.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch—I’d love to connect and collaborate!

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
